MainClaim.text: "The Heideggerian account of ontotheological constitution of Western metaphysics has been influential for contemporary philosophy of religion and for philosophical perspectives on theology and the divine

s ontotheology.text: "Meillassoux reintroduces an explicitly philosophical notion of God as a being/entity

s critique of ontotheology.text: "Heidegger views Nietzsche as a culmination of ontotheological thinking

s speculative materialism.text: "Meillassoux's speculative materialism is an absolute certainty of the thinkability of being-without-thinking

s postmetaphysical divinity.text: "Heideggerian postmetaphysics makes the former points of reference interdependent dimensions or poles in a multidimensional and multipolar event of the spatiotemporal contextualization of meaningful presence."

s virtual god.text: "Meillassoux introduces a notion of a God-entity that does not exist

s notion of the ultimate god.text: "The ultimate god is a dimension of ultimate purpose

s notion of the divine.text: "Meillassoux's notion of the divine is a merely possible and contingent one

s rejection of fideism.text: "Meillassoux rejects the idea that the contemporary end of metaphysics is an end which

s notion of the god-less thinking.text: "Heidegger's god-less thinking is perhaps closer to the divine god

s notion of the fourfold.text: "Heidegger's fourfold makes the divinities one of the four meaning-dimensions that converge in the singular and situated meaningfulness of a particular thing."

s notion of the divine as an ultimate se.text: "Badiou's notion of the divine is an ultimate sense-granting purpose whose sole form of presence is that of an indication

s notion of the divine as a merely possi.text: "Meillassoux's notion of the divine is a merely possible and contingent one

s notion of the divinities.text: "The divinities are the indications or hints of an ultimate meaning

s notion of the ultimate god as a dimens.text: "The ultimate god is a dimension of ultimate purpose
"The ultimate god is a dimension of radical futurity
"The ultimate god is a dimension of futural ones
"The ultimate god is a dimension of the post-ontotheological theologians

s need for beyng.text: "The ultimate god is a dimension of the human being's need for beyng

s notion of the ultimate god as a dimens.text: "The ultimate god is a dimension of the recognition of the belonging of the human being to beyng
"The ultimate god is a dimension of the divine indications or hints
"The ultimate god is a dimension of the futural ones of the divine
"The ultimate god is a dimension of the subjective truth-processes

s need for beyng through god.text: "The ultimate god is a dimension of the human being's need for beyng through god

s notion of the ultimate god as a dimens.text: "The ultimate god is a dimension of the admission by god that it needs beyng
"The ultimate god is a dimension of the divine indications or hints of an ultimate meaning
"The ultimate god is a dimension of the futural ones of the divine through the emergence of a new dimension of ultimate purposiveness
